trans-unit.source: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a Windows 7 taskbar button.
The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] na barra de tarefas oferece funcionalidade aprimorada para iniciar programas diretamente a partir do botão de barra de tarefas usando listas de saltos.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu.
trans-unit.target: As listas de saltos também são usadas no [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] menu Iniciar.

trans-unit.source: You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu.
trans-unit.target: Você acessa uma lista de atalhos, clicando em um botão de barra de tarefas ou clicando na seta ao lado de um programa no menu Iniciar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre listas de saltos, consulte o [na barra de tarefas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) seção as diretrizes de interação de experiência de usuário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe fornece um wrapper gerenciado para a funcionalidade de lista de atalhos do [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] na barra de tarefas e gerencia os dados passados para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: The functionality exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade exposta pelo <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe não está disponível em versões do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] anteriores [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Applications that use the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos que usam o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe será executado em outras versões do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], mas a lista de atalhos não estará disponível.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o shell do Windows e APIs nativas de lista de salto, consulte [extensões da barra de tarefas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra o salto lista do Windows Media Player, com itens no **tarefas** e **frequentes** categorias.

trans-unit.source: ![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List")
trans-unit.target: ![Lista de saltos do Windows Media Player](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "lista de salto do Windows Media Player")

trans-unit.source: Windows Media Player Jump List
trans-unit.target: Lista de saltos do Windows Media Player

trans-unit.source: Configuring a Jump List
trans-unit.target: Configurar uma lista de salto

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: Listas de salto podem conter dois tipos de itens, uma <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> é um link para um programa e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> é um link para um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: Você pode separar visualmente os itens em uma lista de atalhos, criando um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> que não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This empty <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Este vazio <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> será exibido como uma linha horizontal na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: If the type of the file specified in a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo do arquivo especificado em um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> não está registrado com seu aplicativo, o arquivo não será exibido na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> que aponta para um arquivo. txt, seu aplicativo deve ser registrado para manipular arquivos. txt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Introdução às associações de arquivo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).

trans-unit.source: Jump items are placed into categories in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: Itens de salto são colocados em categorias de <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> is displayed in the **Tasks** category.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> é exibido no **tarefas** categoria.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar se o padrão **recentes** e **frequentes** as categorias são exibidas no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo dessas categorias é gerenciado pelo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Porque essas categorias podem conter muitos dos mesmos dados, você normalmente exibe um ou outro no seu <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] gerencia automaticamente os itens recentes, se eles são abertos por meio de uma caixa de diálogo comuns ou usados para abrir um aplicativo por meio de associação de tipo de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando um item é acessado por meio da lista de atalhos, você pode notificar o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell para adicionar o item a **recentes** categoria chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Applying a Jump List to the Windows Shell
trans-unit.target: Aplicação de uma lista de salto para o Shell do Windows

trans-unit.source: You cannot access the shell’s Jump List directly or read its contents into the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode acessar a lista de atalhos do shell diretamente ou ler seu conteúdo para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe fornece uma representação de uma lista de atalhos que você pode trabalhar com e, em seguida, aplicar ao [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: You typically create a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> and set it one time when the application is first run.
trans-unit.target: Você normalmente cria um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> e defini-la uma vez quando o aplicativo é executado pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: However, you can modify or replace the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at run time.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode modificar ou substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: When you have set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> properties, you must apply the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Quando você tiver definido o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> propriedades, você deve aplicar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para o shell do Windows antes de seu conteúdo é exibido na lista de atalhos da barra de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: This is done automatically when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito automaticamente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> é anexado primeiro a um aplicativo em XAML ou em uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you modify the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at run time, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Se você modificar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> em tempo de execução, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> método para aplicar o conteúdo atual para o shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Setting a Jump List in XAML
trans-unit.target: Configurar uma lista de salto em XAML

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is not automatically attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> automaticamente não está anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: You attach a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in XAML by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: Anexar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para um <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto em XAML usando a sintaxe da propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface para oferecer suporte a declaração de XAML de um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to the current <xref:System.Windows.Application>, it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> é declarado em XAML e anexado ao atual <xref:System.Windows.Application>, é aplicada automaticamente para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell quando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> é inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code
trans-unit.target: Configuração e a modificação de uma lista de salto no código

trans-unit.source: You attach a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in code by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Anexar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para um <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto no código chamando estático <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This also applies the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Isso também se aplica a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: To modify a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at run time, you call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> that is currently attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> em tempo de execução, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A> método para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> que está conectado no momento a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.

trans-unit.source: After you have modified the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply the changes to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Depois que você modificou as propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> método para aplicar as alterações para o shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: You typically create one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> that is attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Application> and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Você geralmente cria um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> que está associada a <xref:System.Windows.Application> e aplicadas ao [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: However, you can create multiple <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> objects.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode criar várias <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Apenas uma <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> por vez pode ser aplicado ao [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell e apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> por vez pode ser associada com um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework não exige que eles sejam iguais <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.

trans-unit.source: This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe contém uma demanda de link no nível de classe que se aplica a todos os membros.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> é gerada quando o chamador imediato não tem permissão de confiança total.

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as exigências de segurança, consulte [demandas de Link](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) e [demandas de herança](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an application with a Jump List.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um aplicativo com uma lista de atalhos.

trans-unit.source: The application has three buttons that enable you to add a task to the current Jump List, clear the contents of the Jump List, and apply a new Jump List to the application.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo tem três botões que permitem que você adicionar uma tarefa para a lista atual de salto, limpar o conteúdo da lista de atalhos e aplicar uma nova lista de atalhos para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declare a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> in markup.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como declarar uma <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> na marcação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> contains two <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> links and one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> contém duas <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> links e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.

trans-unit.source: Applying the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> to the shell will fail if the application is not registered to handle the .txt file name extension.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> para o shell falhará se o aplicativo não está registrado para manipular a extensão de nome de arquivo. txt.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the code-behind page for `App.xaml`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a página de code-behind para `App.xaml`.

trans-unit.source: This code handles the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Esse código manipula a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the markup used to create the application user interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a marcação usada para criar a interface de usuário do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the code-behind page for `MainWindow.xaml`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a página de code-behind para `MainWindow.xaml`.

trans-unit.source: This code demonstrates how to modify, clear, and create a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: Esse código demonstra como modificar, limpar e criar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> no código de procedimento.

trans-unit.source: For the new Jump List, the static <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method is called to associate the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> with the current application and apply the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Para a nova lista de atalhos, estático <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> método é chamado para associar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> com o aplicativo atual e aplicar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para o shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: for full access to modify the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo modificar o shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Ação de segurança: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> class.
requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem" /> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
A value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
A value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> class with the specified parameters.
The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **recentes** e **frequentes** categorias geralmente contêm muitos dos mesmos itens de salto.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, aplicativos normalmente exibem um o **recentes** ou **frequentes** categoria na lista de atalhos, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified item to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
The path to add to the Jump List.
Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados recentemente na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.String%29> method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.String%29> método para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicione um caminho de item para o **recentes** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.String%29> will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo não está registrado para manipular o tipo de arquivo do item, ele não aparecerá no **recentes** lista e chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.String%29> falhará em modo silencioso.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath" /> to add to the Jump List.
Adds the specified jump path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados recentemente na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath%29> method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath%29> método para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicionar o caminho de salto especificado para o **recentes** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath%29> will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo não está registrado para manipular o tipo de arquivo do item, ele não aparecerá no **recentes** lista e chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath%29> falhará em modo silencioso.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask" /> to add to the Jump List.
Adds the specified jump task to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados recentemente na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask%29> method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump task to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%28System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask%29> método para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicionar a tarefa de salto especificado para o **recentes** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> to the Windows shell in its current state.
The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> método envia o conteúdo de <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para o shell do Windows em seu estado atual.

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois que esta chamada é concluída, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows é adicionado com êxito à sua lista de atalhos da barra de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the current <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> and clear the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como obter atual <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> e limpar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method is then called to apply the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> changes to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> método é chamado para aplicar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> muda para o shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> is not completely initialized.
requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> initialization.
The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface para oferecer suporte a declaração de XAML de um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit%2A> method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit%2A> método só é chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> é declarado em XAML e anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application> usando a sintaxe da propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Não chame este método do seu código.

trans-unit.source: This call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit" /> is nested in a previous call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit" />.
Signals the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> initialization.
The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> classe implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface para oferecer suporte a declaração de XAML de um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> método só é chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> é declarado em XAML e anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application> usando a sintaxe da propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Não chame este método do seu código.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> method has the same effect as the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> método tem o mesmo efeito que o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> envia o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para o shell do Windows em seu estado atual.

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois que esta chamada é concluída, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows foi adicionado com êxito a lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit" /> is not paired with a call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit" />.
The application associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" />.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> object associated with an application.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> object associated with the specified application.
You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A> método para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> atualmente associado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that this be the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> that is currently applied to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework não exige que esse seja o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> que está aplicada atualmente no shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> associated with the current application.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como obter o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> associado ao aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> collection and added to the **Recent** category.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> coleta e adicionados ao **recentes** categoria.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method is called to apply the updated <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> método é chamado para aplicar a atualização <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> para o shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem" /> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem" /> objects displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem" /> objetos exibidos na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: Listas de salto podem conter dois tipos de itens, uma <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> é um link para um programa e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> é um link para um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> é criado, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: You can add any <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> ou <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program.
trans-unit.target: A coleção conterá somente os itens que foram adicionados pelo seu programa.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> methods, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> foi passado para o shell do Windows por uma chamada bem-sucedida para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> métodos, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> coleção conterá somente os itens que foram adicionados com êxito a lista de atalhos da barra de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: Items that were not successfully added are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Itens que não foram adicionados com êxito são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the current <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> and clear the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como obter atual <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> e limpar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method is then called to apply the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> changes to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> método é chamado para aplicar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> muda para o shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items are not successfully added to the Jump List by the Windows shell.

After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois do conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> são aplicadas para o shell do Windows, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows foi adicionado com êxito a lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> event to display the rejected items in a message box.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> evento para exibir os itens rejeitados em uma caixa de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items previously in the Jump List are removed from the list by the user.

After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois do conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> são aplicadas para o shell do Windows, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows foi adicionado com êxito a lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> event to display the rejected items in a message box.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> evento para exibir os itens rejeitados em uma caixa de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The application associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> to associate with the application.
Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList" /> object associated with an application.
You can create multiple <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar várias <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> objetos.

trans-unit.source: However, only one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> por vez pode ser associada com um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> método para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> atualmente associado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> in code.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> no código.

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method is called to associate the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> with the current application.
trans-unit.target: Estático <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> método é chamado para associar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> com o aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is automatically applied to the Windows shell when it is set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> é aplicada automaticamente para o shell do Windows quando ela é definida.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
<see langword="true" /> if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os itens usados com frequência são exibidos na lista de saltos; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **frequentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados com frequência na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **recentes** e **frequentes** categorias geralmente contêm muitos dos mesmos itens de salto.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, aplicativos normalmente exibem um o **recentes** ou **frequentes** categoria na lista de atalhos, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> configured to show the **Frequent** category.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> configurados para mostrar o **frequentes** categoria.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
<see langword="true" /> if recently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os itens usados recentemente são exibidas na lista de saltos; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados com frequência na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **recentes** e **frequentes** categorias geralmente contêm muitos dos mesmos itens de salto.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, aplicativos normalmente exibem um o **recentes** ou **frequentes** categoria na lista de atalhos, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> método para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicionar itens para o **recentes** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo não está registrado para manipular o tipo de nome de arquivo do item, ele não aparecerá no **recentes** lista e chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> falhará em modo silencioso.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> configured to show the **Recent** category.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> configurados para mostrar o **recentes** categoria.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> visão geral da classe.
